titles: Enfield Common: or, The young damsel cured of the green sickness by a lusty gallant, vvho happen'd to meet her in the mid'st of Enfield Common. To an excellent new tune.
author: Lusty gallant.
publisher: Printed for Charles Bates at the Sun and Bible in Pye-corner.,
notes: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "On Enfield Common I met a woman ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
